There was a startled reaction in the sold out crowd, when the words LOS ANGELES NOVEMBER 2019 appeared in the very first scene. Remember, it's June 26, 1982 and we're Angelenos, seeing Blade Runner on it's second day of the opening weekend. Los Angeles! Our city! The Future! You could tell, everyone was already doing math on the distance of Time to The Future. Thirty seven years from now!
For the rest of the showing it was absolute silence, shock or gasps of surprise. It was overwhelming to behold. We were dazzled. Flying cars! Tremendous architecture and extraordinary displays of electric and Neon lights! Those huge, incredible motion image billboards!
